title: The Archer From Kipleth
description: This is the second book in the continuing war for the Heaven's Key, a strange amalgamation of magical objects with which the Lord of Lightning, Deifol Hroth, wishes to bring down the Wanderer, the second moon of earth, to destroy all that lives.Iounelle, the last elf, and her beloved Archer have cornered Deifol Hroth in Lanis Rhyl Landemiriam, the empty elvish capitol. Inside, the Lord of Lightning has discovered an elvish crystal with unspeakable power, the Lhalii.In the northern wastes, young Arnwylf and a band of human warriors keeps Ravensdred and a remnant of the garond army holed up in an Ancient stone fortress thawed from the Ice Fields of Eann. If they can drive them out, Arnwylf may once again possess the Sun Sword, the Mattear Gram.In New Rogar Li, politics are ever at play. Wynnfrith has a farsight vision of an overlooked object of awesome elemental power, and knows she must travel to get it. The only problem is, the Ar, the Heart of the Earth, the object that may be the key to controlling all the other objects of power, lies deep in the heart of the garond army in the Far Grasslands.
author: K.J. Hargan
